prontera,138,184,7	script	Rops	790,{
    OnVendingClick:
    .@select = (select("Itens:Visual"));
    if(.@select == 1){
    callshop("Div",1);end;}
    if(.@select == 2){
       switch(select(" Visual Topo: Visual Meio: Visual Baixo: Visual Capa: Baratinhos: Baratinhos 2")	){
       case 1:
       callshop("VisuTOP",1); end;
       case 2:
       callshop("VisuMeio",1); end;   
       case 3:
       callshop("VisuBAIXO",1); end;
       case 4:
       callshop("VisuCAPA",1); end;
       case 5:
       callshop("VisuGENERICO",1); end;       
       case 6:
       callshop("VisuGENERICOdois",1); end;       	   
       default:break;} 
    end;}
   end; 
 OnInit:
showvend( "Rops", 1, "Rops" );
end;   
}
prontera,147,160,6	script	Gerente de Almas	833,{
OnVendingClick:
switch(select("Caveiras:Fragmento dos Espadchins:Fragmento dos Arqueiros:Fragmento dos Mercadores:Fragmento dos Gatunos:Fragmento dos Novicos:Fragmento dos Magos:Fragmento dos Expandidos")) {
		case 1:
        	callshop( "caveira", 1 );
            end;            
        case 2: // Pet Food
			callshop( "Espadchin", 1 );
			end; // We end the script just after opening the shop so no need to break
		case 3: // Pet Armor
			callshop( "Arqueiros", 1 );
			end;
		case 4: // Taming Items
			callshop( "Mercadores", 1 );
			end;
		case 5: // Taming Items
			callshop( "Gatunos", 1 );
			end;	
		case 6: // Taming Items
			callshop( "Novicos", 1 );
			end;
		case 7: // Taming Items
			callshop( "Magos", 1 );
			end;	
		case 8: // Taming Items
			callshop( "Expandidos", 1 );
			end;							
		default: // Any other case not covered above. "Not today" in this example.
			close; // This statement closes and ends the script so no need to end again
	}
end;
OnInit:
showvend( "Gerente de Almas", 1, "Gerente de Almas" );
end;
}


-	itemshop	Espadchin	-1,29541,7420:30,22110:3000,2383:1000

-	itemshop	Arqueiros	-1,29543,7420:30,22111:3000	

-	itemshop	Mercadores	-1,29544,7420:30,22107:3000,1530:1000

-	itemshop	Gatunos	-1,29545,7420:30,22112:3000

-	itemshop	Novicos	-1,29546,7420:30,19509:3000,2630:1000

-	itemshop	Magos	-1,29542,7420:30,22108:3000,4441:3000,4145:3000,4365:3000,2410:1000,4407:1000

-	itemshop	Expandidos	-1,29547,7420:30,22109:3000,4441:3000,4145:3000,4365:3000

-	itemshop	caveira	-1,7420,7776:3000,29541:30,29543:30,29544:30,29545:30,29546:30,29542:30,29547:30,4318:1000,4324:1000,18561:500,18894:500
